author: vinodkv
msg: MAPREDUCE-913. TaskRunner crashes with NPE resulting in held up slots, UNINITIALIZED tasks and hung TaskTracker. Contributed by Amareshwari Sriramadasu and Sreekanth Ramakrishnan.

author: mrisaliti
msg: Some missing security permissions for HHFacility, Setup and BI components

author: odeakin
msg: The spec says that if the Boot-Class-Path entry in a java agent manifest specifies a relative path, that path should be taken relative to the location of the agent jar. Also adding a regression test case for this fix.

author: jleroux
msg: Allows to initially collapse the search screenlet of a layered lookup, default to false.

It was harder than I though because of the async nature of Ajax. So I had to use a setTimeout with a 400 ms timeout. Hopefully it will work in any environments. I chose 400 because I found it worked well on my machine, 300 also but to be sure I picked 400, 200 was too low it seems.
